title: Type from a old GQ cover...?
content:
2004, GQ Cover, what is the font?

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 4 copy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201709/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%204%20copy.jpg) | 76.4 KB |
author: Regabob

comments.content: GQ misspelled "Orlando Bloom" on its cover?
It's a pun. Bloom blooms. Get it?

That is [Gridnik Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201709/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/foundry_gridnik/gridnik_bold.html) from The Foundry.

As for the headline, it's a play on words with his last name...

Orlando  
----------  
Blooms  
in Lord  
of the Rings
